From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To enable trunk status messaging, use the **logging event trunk-status** command in interface configuration mode. To disable trunk status messaging, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: *Aug 4 17:27:01.404 UTC: %DTP-SPSTBY-5-NONTRUNKPORTON: Port Gi3/3 has become non-trunk
*Aug 4 17:27:00.773 UTC: %DTP-SP-5-NONTRUNKPORTON: Port Gi3/3 has become non-trunk
ExtraInfo: The logging event bundle-status command is not applicable on Port Channel or Ether-Channel interfaces.
